text: Toni Ivanov (Bulgarian: Тони Иванов; born 21 March 1999) is a Bulgarian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Yantra Gabrovo on loan from Slavia Sofia. ==Career== ===Slavia Sofia=== Ivanov moved to Slavia Sofia on 8 January 2018 coming from Ludogorets Razgrad Academy.Славия представи трима нови играчи He made his professional debut for the team on 18 February 2018 in the first league match for the year, against his youth club Ludogorets Razgrad.Поражение в Разград на старта на 2018 година On 29 April 2018, he scored his first goal in a league match against Pirin Blagoevgrad.Славия триумфира в Група "А" на втората осмица ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !colspan="3"|Club performance!!colspan="2"|League!!colspan="2"|Cup!!colspan="2"|Continental!!colspan="2"|Other!!colspan="3"|Total |- !Club!!League!!Season!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- !colspan="3"|Bulgaria!!colspan="2"|League!!colspan="2"|Bulgarian Cup!!colspan="2"|Europe!!colspan="2"|OtherIncludes Bulgarian Supercup matches.!!colspan="2"|Total |- |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Ludogorets II | rowspan="2"|Second League |2016–17 |1||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||1||0 |- |2017–18 |7||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||7||0 |- !colspan=2 | Total !8!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!8!!0 |- |rowspan="2" valign="center"|Slavia Sofia | rowspan="1"|First League |2017–18 |3||1||0||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||3||1 |- !colspan=2 | Total !3!!1!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!3!!1 |- !colspan="3"|Career statistics !!
